name: GoodNoon
description:
Collect all the ASICS, worship all the statues, get all the bytes. You'll need to complete all the quests and mine a few blocks to get all the loot.

Mouse for Menus and buttons, AWSD or arrows for movement. Space to attack, M to mine (after you've bought the pickaxe, BUY THIS FIRST) , K to worship (do at the statues not the Nervos guys or anyone else you recognise), P is to pause.
